H0.text: The cell wall is a structure found in a plant cell but not in an animal cell.

H1.text: Cell membrane is the structure found in a plant cell but not in an animal cell.

H2.text: Cytoplasm is the structure found in a plant cell but not in an animal cell.

H3.text: Nucleus is the structure found in a plant cell but not in an animal cell.

A4.text: cells walls are prevalent in fungi, algae and plants but absent from animals and many other taxa.
